answers.answer: I have read it can mean there are some issues with the baby because they are not taking in the amniotic fluid like they should be. But it could also be just fine. I wouldn't stress too much just because you don't want your little one to feel your stress. Wait until you hear back from your doctor, they will tell you if you need to worry or what to do to help the baby. I know it's easier said than done, but just know that everything should be just fine.
Too much amniotic fluid is an indication of issues. Can be diabetes or abnormalities with the pregnancy or the baby.
At my 30 week my fluid was 6.5 which is low. I go monday at 31 to see if its even lower but hoping better. Doc wants between 8-10 to be safe. If its below 6 they will probably deliver.

I am Thankful to the Lord to say that eveything is o.k. with my baby. No issues. My amniotic fluid went down from 38% to 26%. Have to go back next week to follow up. Now just have to wait in m t v 3 hour glucose test.
I'm glad everything is good with your little one! :)
What is normal range of amniotic fluid according to your dr...please tell me.I have completed 32 weeks now but when i had completed 25 weeks my amniotic fluid index was 24 cm....
Congratulations now everything is ok....can u tell me how it went down...and what is the normal range of amniotic fluid at 32 weeks
I went yesterday to be rechecked and my fluid came up to 9.8 from 6.5. Doc said normal at 31-33 weeks was between 8-10.

question: I will be 28 weeks tomorrow and yesterday at my doctor's appointment. My doctor said that my amniotic fluid is too high. I am at 38%. Every test so far given has been good. Had to do glucose testing as well and just waiting for the results. I have an appointment on tomorrow for more testing. Should I be worried because I am.
title: Amniotic fluid Worries
